ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: More women playing EQ lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: I love Chivalry!  I might have to try a mail character just to see if there is a difference in my perspective.  As far as Guild s..... I ve not become a member
ygData.messageBody:
I love Chivalry! I might have to try a mail character just to see if there
is a difference in my perspective. As far as Guild's..... I've not become a
member of one yet. I don't really have the time it takes to be in a Guild.
Wouldn't want to be a leader either. I enjoy the game for what it is, a
game and I'm having fun meeting new people.

I'll be playing Allilee and Maralexis tonight about 7 pm PDT if anyone on
Tarew wants to say hello. Got to work on the little ones!

Kanalyn 16 Druid
Analyn 9 Beastlord
Allilee 6 Ranger
Maralexis 6 Wizard

Tarew Marr
